thread.section_title: nyma, the New York Manhattan Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Over Rated Hotel
thread.title_full: Over Rated Hotel - Review of nyma, the New York Manhattan Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: r12bam
title: Over Rated Hotel
text:
Great location 5 minutes away to Time Square Garden right behind empire state building. 17th floor deck bar such a cool place to hang out.
check in process was very disappointing after a 18 hours flight exhausted booking was no where to be found. Front desk staff that morning were not accomodating at all. And rude i checked in march 11 2017
Rooms are spacious however hallway stinks
room is booked with complimentary breakfast not bad at all but dining area is the worst ever. Will not recommended at all. I know new yorks hotels are pricey but this hotel does not worth it at all
